<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 4"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Phonetic Training](/Feats.aspx?ID=6346) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=535" />
<trait label="Skill" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=695" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 203 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Archetype** [Linguist](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=253)

**Prerequisites**
[Linguist Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=6344); Expert in [Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=47)

</column>

---

You can pronounce and repeat words with near-perfect accuracy even if you don’t understand their meaning, and you can write them down in a phonetic script that allows you or another creature with Phonetic Training to read it later. Even if the words are in a language with sounds you can’t pronounce, you can faithfully transcribe them. Memorizing long sequences of words remains just as difficult as it is normally.
name: Phonetic Training
